content:
I tempi di avvio dipendono principalmente da quanto è grande l'archivio di posta e da come è organizzato (tutto in poche cartelle o suddiviso in molte cartelle).

Dopo aver fatto un backup -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo prova a compattare le cartelle -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/compattazione-cartelle

content: Please post the complete error message on sending, plus a screenshot of your SMTP setup. Thank you.

content: Thank you for your answer. the 2 screenshot.
creator: lpma1957

content: The recommended settings are: smtp.sfr.fr on 465, SSL/TLS, normal password, email address. Also allowed is: smtp.sfr.fr on 25, security = none, authentication = password, transmitted insecurely, User Name = email address, but this probably won't work when you connect to a non-SFR network.
creator: sfhowes

content: Excuse me but I begin on the forum and it's not when we start. The 1rst solution don't run and the 2nd solution run only with mails SFR but not other : Wanadoo, Thank you,
creator: lpma1957

content: Be sure to use your complete email address, including the @ and whatever follows. Your screenshot indicates you are not doing that.
creator: davidsk

content:
lpma1957 said
Excuse me but I begin on the forum and it's not when we start. The 1rst solution don't run and the 2nd solution run only with mails SFR but not other : Wanadoo, Thank you,

For Wanadoo accounts, set up a separate smtp server smtp.orange.fr (465, SSL/TLS, normal password, email address) and set the Wanadoo account to send on that server.
